text: Zedekiah gu hai baahi ang gi Nebuchadnezzar di king aamua o Babylon, gei Nebuchadnezzar mo ana gau dauwa huogodoo gu lloomoi, gu heebagi gi Jerusalem i di madangaholu laangi o di madangaholu malama o di hiwa ngadau nogo king ai Zedekiah. Digaula guu hau nadau waahale laa i daha mo di waahale, gaa hau di nadau abaaba e duuli haganiga di maa,25.1 Jeremiah 21.1-10; 34.1-5; Ezekiel 24.2
